question: crimes by Minors are on the rose in recent times. the psychologist claims that the fundamental reasons for this is that children these days are lacking the social and emotional learning they need from parents and teachers.  To what extent do you agree / di
text: The violence by the juniors are increasing day by day. Counsellors believe that their family members and mentors are responsible for this as they are not giving moral values to their offspring. I agree with this statement onto large extent, some of the points are mentioned in upcoming paragraphs to support my view.

Levels of wrongdoing with the youth is rising rapidly in most cities around the world. Firstly, the lack of supervision of folks; nowadays both father and mother are working to come up with daily expenses. Hence, they get less time to spend with their babies and teach them ethics which are  very   important for an individual to learn during their growing age. The wrong message received from such episode leads to crime such as heist, rape and much more.

To add upon, subject oriented studies. Teachers focus only on their academic subjects and pressurise students to focus on their marks, they don't focus on the overall development of the pupil.
